# QR Code Images

This directory contains generated QR codes for wallet addresses.

**Auto-Generated:** QR codes are automatically created when wallets are loaded/imported.  
**Filename Format:** `qr_<last12chars>.png` (e.g., `qr_3y79uaneh.png`)  
**Safe to Delete:** All QR codes can be safely deleted - they will be regenerated when needed.

**Note:** QR code PNG files are excluded from version control via `.gitignore` for privacy.
